messages.subject: Why it matters, when it matters
messages.msgSnippet: Question:  How long have you been unschooling? Answer:  since birth!  but my kids did go to an alternative school (named it) for a few years - it is child led
messages.messageBody:
Question: How long have you been unschooling?

Answer: since birth! but my kids did go to an alternative school
(named it) for a few years - it is child led and very
unschooly
they are homeschooling again this year!

---------------------------------

Ah... It must seem I'm just being picky, but I don't say "since
birth," even though Holly was born after Kirby was unschooling at the
age of five.

It seems to me that in the absence of certification, at least there
should be something to go by.

Someone who has conscientiously unschooled for a whole year might be a
better advisor than someone who's unschooled "since birth."

Sandra
